sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Jumbotron, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import API from "./API"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "./app.css" function App() { const [response, setResponse] = useState({}); const [input, setInput] = useState({}); const postAPI = (query) => { API.post(query) .then((res) => setResponse({ response: res.data })) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); postAPI(input); }; const postJSON = { "FixtureData": { "MaxOvertimes": 0, "OvertimeLength": 0.08008281904610115, "SubCode": "NFL", "Code": "American" }, "MatchState": { "TeamInPossession": "Away", "Down": 1, "CurrentQuarter": input.periodVal ? input.periodVal : 1, "AwayTimeoutsRemaining": input.AwayTimeRem ? input.AwayTimeRem : 3, "PlaySubType": "PAT", "Q1Score": { "Away": input.guestValQ1 ? parseInt(input.guestValQ1) : 0, "Home": input.homeValQ1 ? input.homeValQ1 : 0 }, "Q2Score": { "Away": input.guestValQ2 ? input.guestValQ2 : 0, "Home": input.homeValQ2 ? input.homeValQ2 : 0 }, "Q3Score": { "Away": input.guestValQ3 ? input.guestValQ3 : 0, "Home": input.homeValQ3 ? input.homeValQ3 : 0 }, "Q4Score": { "Away": input.guestValQ4 ? input.guestValQ4 : 0, "Home": input.homeValQ4 ? input.homeValQ4 : 0 }, "OTScore": { "Away": input.guestValQ5 ? input.guestValQ5 : 0, "Home": input.homeValQ5 ? input.homeValQ5 : 0 }, "IsClockRunning": true, "HomeTimeoutsRemaining": input.homeTimeRem ?input.homeTimeRem: 3 , "TeamFirstKickoff": "Away", "PlayType": "Standard", "YardsToGo": input.yardsToGo ? input.yardsToGo : 0, "YardLine": input.YardsLine ? input.YardsLine : 1, "TimeRemainingInQuarter": 900 }, "TradingParameters": { "Supremacy": input.supremacy ? input.supremacy : 5 , "TotalPoints": input.totalPts ? input.totalPts : 15 } } console.log(postJSON) const handleInput = (event) => { const { target } = event; const value = target?.value; const name = target?.name setInput({...input,[name]: value}); }; console.log(input); return (
HOME
TIME
Current quarter
Team in pos
Home timeout rem
Away timeout rem
Yards to go
Yards Line
Supremacy
total pts
GUEST
TO GO
SCOREBOARD
DOWN
); } export default App;
